content: संक्षिप् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To collect or heap together; आतपात्ययसंक्षिप्तनविरासु निषादिभिः <ls>R. 1. 52</ls>; <ls>Bk. 5. 86.</ls> {@--2@} To withdraw, destroy. {@--3@} To shorten, curtail, abridge; संक्षिप्येत क्षण इव कथं दीर्घयामा त्रियामा <ls>Me. 108</ls>; <ls>Ms. 7. 34.</ls> {@--4@} To contract, compress. {@--5@} To diminish, lessen. {@--6@} To confine, shut in. {@--7@} To constrain.
